attributes.action: Request a referendum on the £3.9bn refurbishment of the Palace of Westminster
attributes.additional_details:
Give the people of the UK a say over where its parliament sits. 

The Palace of Westminster may occupy a historic site, but it is no longer fit for purpose. 

Build a modern, safe, secure, functional parliamentary campus with chambers, offices and accommodation on site. 

Turn the genuinely historic parts into a museum and sell off the rest of Westminster.

https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2017/mar/10/parliaments-buildings-risk-catastrophic-failure-without-urgent-repairs#comment-94650543
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, request that the UK Government hold a legally binding referendum as to whether the proposed refurbishment of the Palace of Westminster should take place, or whether instead, a new Parliamentary campus be established, allowing for disposal of the old site.
